position: Product@AzaFashions | Strategy & Operations | Product Enthusiast | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: • Unified multiple retail platforms into the online console, improving operational efficiency via seamless omnichannel• Trained LLM models, automating customer services for post order and reducing customer care services by 70%• Implemented designer monetization and personalization strategies, boosting revenue and customer engagement• Launched integrated loyalty program for stores, increasing retention and providing omnichannel experience to users• Automated internal transfers, cutting delivery times by 2-3 days and enhancing the customer delivery experience• Introduced kiosks in stores, increasing engagement and boosting omnichannel sales by 4% via digital integration

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: • Worked cross functionally in Product, driving the implementation of Datasearch dashboards and SSO login systems• Facilitated in designing the framework and developing the Product Tour for the public OmixAtlas data source• Structured tracking installations to continuously track AWS usage, resulting in a 30% reduction in usage of AWS• Organized DataFAIR, an annual event focused on data-centric AI and innovations in pharma and life sciences• Performed in-depth market analysis in order to identify potential market opportunities and upgrades in product

experience.title: APM Fellow
experience.description: ▪ Finished in the top 100 shortlist based on a graduation project.▪ Worked on a product case study to improve the experience for high-frequency users on Swiggy
